title: Freshly renovated 2bed in Albany Park - stainless steel -heat included
posting_body: ['3057 West Argyle Street is located in the 60625 zip code.', 'This building is a short walk from the Brown Line at the Kedzie-Brown stop.', 'Several bus lines also frequent this area.', 'Nearby parks include West River Park, Buckeye Park and Ronan Park.', 'Schools in the area North Park University, Northeastern Illinois University, Northside College Prep, Lyman A Budlong to name a few.', 'This apartment features:', '-Stainless steel appliances', '-Granite countertops', '-Hardwood floors', '-Eat-in kitchen', '-Large living room', '-Lots of natural light', '-Spacious bedroom', '-Modern bathroom', '-Heat Included', '-Back deck space', '-Pet friendly (breed & weight restriction apply, pet fee also applies)', '-Pay laundry on site', 'Studios & 1 bedrooms available for $950-$1150(same building)', 'Contact leasing agent below.', 'Thanks!', 'Funsho Macaulay II', '224-503-5193', '<URL>', 'Kass Management Services Inc.', '2000 N. Racine Suite 4400, Chicago, IL 60614']
